title: Time is all you need
excerpt: Gearing up for a potential career change, I’ve been learning some new (software) skills as of late. Many of which seem more difficult to learn to use than they are.

children.text: Gearing up for a potential career change, I’ve been learning some new (software) skills as of late. Many of which seem more difficult to learn to use than they are.
As it is with most things worth learning how to do.
It appears complicated (and it sometimes is). But it’s often not nearly as tough as we expect.
Most of the time, it just takes time. To learn and to practice.
to give ourselves the space of time we need to do those things.
